org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage
Class AeStorageFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage.AeStorageFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeStorageFactory
public class AeStorageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeStorageFactory

A basic storage factory - this class creates the various storage objects. It uses a storage provider factory to create the providers needed by the storages.

Nested Class Summary
protected  class AeStorageFactory.AeStorageConfigUpdater
          Updates the DB config file with changes from the config.
